owlSpeak.servlet

Class OwlSpeakServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • owlSpeak.servlet.OwlSpeakServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    public class OwlSpeakServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    Class OwlSpeakServlet the main servlet that grants access to the ServetEngine via doGet()
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Dan Denich, Max Grotz, Stefan Ultes <stefan.ultes@uni-ulm.de>
    See Also:
    ServletEngine, Serialized Form
